org.codehaus.griffon.runtime.core.artifact

Class AbstractArtifactHandler<A extends GriffonArtifact>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codehaus.griffon.runtime.core.artifact.AbstractArtifactHandler<A>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ArtifactHandler<A>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ControllerArtifactHandler, ModelArtifactHandler, ServiceArtifactHandler, ViewArtifactHandler

    public abstract class AbstractArtifactHandler<A extends GriffonArtifact>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ArtifactHandler<A>
    Base implementation of the ArtifactHandler interface.
    Since:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Andres Almiray

      • initialize

        public void initialize(@Nonnull
                       java.lang.Class<A>[] classes)
        Description copied from interface: ArtifactHandler
        Initializes the handler with a collection of all available classes this handler can process.

        This is a good time to pre-emptively instantiate beans or perform additional checks on artifacts.

        Specified by:
        initialize in interface ArtifactHandler<A extends GriffonArtifact>
        Parameters:
        classes - an array of all classes this handler should manage

      • isArtifact

        public boolean isArtifact(@Nonnull
                          java.lang.Class<A> clazz)
        Returns true if the target Class is a class artifact handled by this object.

        This implementation performs an equality check on class.name

        Specified by:
        isArtifact in interface ArtifactHandler<A extends GriffonArtifact>
        Parameters:
        clazz - a Class instance
        Returns:
        true if this handler is capable of handling the artifact class, false otherwise.

      • isArtifact

                          GriffonClass clazz)
        Description copied from interface: ArtifactHandler
        Returns true if the target GriffonClass is a class artifact handled by this object.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        clazz - a GriffonClass instance
        Returns:
        true if this handler is capable of handling the clazz parameter, false otherwise.

        @Nonnull
public GriffonClass[] getClasses()
        Description copied from interface: ArtifactHandler
        Returns the set of all artifact classes this handler manages.
        Specified by:

      • getClassFor

        @Nullable
public GriffonClass getClassFor(@Nonnull
                                          java.lang.Class<A> clazz)
        Description copied from interface: ArtifactHandler
        Finds an artifact if the target clazz is handled by this ArtifactHandler.

        Specified by:
        getClassFor in interface ArtifactHandler<A extends GriffonArtifact>
        Parameters:
        clazz - a class object, i.e, BookController
        Returns:
        a GriffonClass that can handle the target class or null if the clazz is not handled by this ArtifactHandler.

      • getClassFor

        @Nullable
public GriffonClass getClassFor(@Nonnull
                                          java.lang.String fqnClassName)
        Description copied from interface: ArtifactHandler
        Finds an artifact by class name if it represents a class that is handled by this ArtifactHandler.

        Specified by:
        getClassFor in interface ArtifactHandler<A extends GriffonArtifact>
        Parameters:
        fqnClassName - a full qualified class name, i.e, "book.BookController"
        Returns:
        a GriffonClass that can handle the target class or null if the clazz is not handled by this ArtifactHandler.

      • findClassFor

        @Nullable
public GriffonClass findClassFor(@Nonnull
                                           java.lang.String propertyName)
        Description copied from interface: ArtifactHandler
        Finds an artifact by its property name.

        Examples: findClassfor("fooService") returns an artifact class that can handle FooService.

        Should propertyName contain any dots then the portion after the last dot will be considered only.

        Specified by:
        findClassFor in interface ArtifactHandler<A extends GriffonArtifact>
        Parameters:
        propertyName - the property representation of an artifact, e.g. 'fooService'
        Returns:
        a GriffonClass instance if there's a match, null otherwise.

        @Nonnull
protected GriffonApplication getApplication()
